duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the financial and accounting operations of the business and related companies.
Enhance the accuracy of the company’s financial results and maintain compliant and adequate financial and accounting records and systems.
Perform month-end closing processes, including preparation of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements and related reports.
Oversee Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable for accuracy and timelines.
Assist with the compliance with federal, state, and local regulations and filings.
Support in the development of monthly analytics related to KPIs, product profitability, sales, margins, and inventory valuation and control.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
